title: Please identify this typeface
content:
I'm trying to match this 'Never Knowingly Undersold' typeface used by John Lewis.

Any help would be much appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PICT1855.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018122715/http:/typophile.com/files/PICT1855.jpg) | 126.89 KB |
author: stuckinazoo

comments.content: So I've found Gill Sans is very close apart from the 'r'...?
You might as well just use Gill. This is J. L's own font I think, a 'customised' version, but not the one they usually use which has sheared off terminals at quite an ugly angle.
Thanks. Yes the JL / Waitrose terminals are a bit silly now I've thought about it.
